Hi {{28.name}},

Thank you for applying for the {{8.Title}} postion. We truly appreciate your interest in joining our team and the time you took to submit your application.

Our recruitment team will carefully review all applications, and weâ€™ll keep you updated on the progress of yours. You will be notified whether or not you have been shortlisted for an interview.

We are grateful for your interest in our practice and are committed to ensuring a fair and transparent hiring process for all candidates.

Warm Regards,

Smile Cliniq Hiring Team

Smile Cliniq
